meanings.definition: A principal taxonomic category that ranks above class and below kingdom.
meanings.sent1: In the animal kingdom, the phylum is an important classification level.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use phylum to organize different types of animals.
meanings.sent3: The phylum of insects decided to have a party to celebrate their classification.
meanings.sent4: The phylum of birds soared high above, each one a unique member of the group.
meanings.sent5: Learning about the phylum helps us understand the diversity of living things.

meanings.definition: A group of organisms that are classified together based on certain common characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The marine phylum includes various types of sea creatures.
meanings.sent2: Birds and mammals belong to different phyla in the animal kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The phylum of plants gathered for a photosynthesis competition.
meanings.sent4: The phylum of reptiles slithered together in harmony, each with its own unique traits.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the phylum of insects reveals fascinating similarities and differences.
